panels.description: Time to first token (TTFT) measures the latency from request start until the first token arrives. Lower values indicate faster initial response times for streaming requests.
panels.title: Time to First Token (TTFT)

panels.description: Output tokens generated per second. Higher values indicate faster model response throughput. Useful for comparing model performance in latency-sensitive applications.
panels.title: Tokens per Second

targets.query: {resource.service.name="Archestra Platform API" && span.route.category="llm-proxy"} | select(span.llm.provider, span.llm.model, span.profile.name)
{resource.service.name="Archestra Platform API" && span.route.category="mcp-gateway"} | select(span.mcp.server_name, span.mcp.tool_name, span.profile.name)

panels.description: Total unique executions per agent, identified by X-Archestra-Execution-Id header. Shows a sliding window — values rise as new executions enter the window and drop as old ones fall out.
panels.title: Executions per Agent ($agent_cost_range)

panels.description: LLM inference cost per agent. Shows a sliding window — each point represents the total cost in the preceding interval. Values rise as new costs enter the window and drop as old ones fall out.
panels.title: Inference Cost per Agent ($agent_cost_range)

panels.description:
Inference + N8N cost: LLM token cost + execution cost ($1 per execution). Shows a sliding window — values rise as new costs enter the window and drop as old ones fall out.
Formula: sum(llm_cost_total) by (agent_id) + round(sum(agent_executions_total) by (agent_id)) * 1
panels.title: Inference + N8N Cost ($agent_cost_range)

list.description: Select the Prometheus datasource for metrics
list.label: Metrics Datasource
list.name: metrics_datasource

list.description: Select the Tempo datasource for traces
list.label: Traces Datasource
list.name: traces_datasource

list.description: Time range for Agent TCO panels
list.label: Agent Cost Range
list.name: agent_cost_range
